attributes.action: Step down and allow Alan Johnson or someone with a better public image for the labour party to step up.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe Gordon Brown is a great leader but the series of events has not portrayed him in a good light, therefore to lead the party in to victory a change in leadership is needed, i believe the only way is to improve the image of the party and not to allow the Torys in to power and more importantly the BNP to gain power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
